description: For a little pep in your step on your next run, these men’s run socks offer both a zesty external pattern and built-in, feel-good construction. Made from responsibly sourced Merino wool, these socks are naturally odor-resistant, breathable, and comfy. Plus, they are purpose-made with the 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a performance-oriented fit, a Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced comfort, and Indestructawool™ technology for extended durability. When you’re ready to log the miles, these socks will bring the zing.
name: Smartwool Run Zero Cushion Mid Crew Pattern Socks - Mens

specs.value: 51% Merino Wool, 15% Nylon, 30% Recycled Nylon, 4% Elastane
